claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

rejected_evidence.quote: The antigens used in the assays were baculovirus derived rHAs representing the A/Solomon Islands/03/2006 (H1N1), A/Wisconsin/67/2005 (H3N2), and B/Malaysia/2506/2004 viruses, provided by Protein Sciences Corporation.
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote specifies that the recombinant hemagglutinin antigens in Flublok are derived from the same strains as those selected for the seasonal vaccine, which are the WHO- and FDA-recommended strains for that year, supporting the claim of identical antigenic match.
